By Lisa Shock on Friday, June 28, 2002 - 12:09 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Friday, June 28, 2002 - 12:22 pm:

It definitely takes a while, 1014 seems kind of early. Also, keep visiting the shop. You won't know it has been introduced until you visit.
